SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GUI
public class GUI extends javafx.application.Application
Main GUI application. Also acts as a "repository" of common objects between controllers.

  • Nested Class Summary

    As soon as the user connects to the server, he's assigned a UserInfo he will use to communicate with the server itself.
